pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multinomial Mixed Effects Models // Fit Gaussian Multinomial mixed-effects models for small area estimation: Model 1, with one random effect in each category of the response variable (Lopez-Vizcaino,E. et al., 2013) doi:10.1177/1471082X13478873; Model 2, introducing independent time effect; Model 3, introducing correlated time effect. mme calculates direct and parametric bootstrap MSE estimators (Lopez-Vizcaino,E et al., 2014) doi:10.1111/rssa.12085.
